articles.title: NASA asteroid mission: Psyche Spacecraft almost ready for launch - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA asteroid mission: The US space agency recently invited members of the media at JPL to see its Psyche Spacecraft, which is due to launch from Cape Canaveral in August. Psyche will be on a mission to orbit an asteroid.
